name: Scary Evil House Escape
description:
Be ready to start your adventure life in this scary game. You have to complete the puzzle survival missions before the evil catches you. You are in the Scary Old House. The Evil is patrolling, you have to save yourself from it and prove that you are the only best survivor. The keys of the doors are in different room, which you have to find and complete the puzzle so you can escape from here. The Evil is very clever and knows your why. So be alert from her any kind of move which she makes.

Key-Features:
-Scary Old House
-Realistic Sound Effects
